amendment.description: Amendment added job protection language for volunteer firefighters and emergency medical personnel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-136 to provide up to 14 days per calendar year of job protection for volunteer emergency service personnel who respond to a Presidentially-declared disaster in an official capacity. Any individual discriminated against in violation of the provision may seek redress in court.
